verses.roman:
kāli madhyāhne teṅho āsibena tomāra ghare
pāka-sāmagrī ānaha, āmi bhikṣā dimu tāṅre

synonyms: kāli madhyāhne—tomorrow at noon; teṅho—He; āsibena—will come; tomāra ghare—to your place; pāka-sāmagrī ānaha—please bring everything necessary for cooking; āmi—I; bhikṣā dimu—shall cook and offer food; tāṅre—to Him.
translation: "Tomorrow at noon He will come to your home. Therefore please bring all kinds of cooking ingredients. I shall personally cook and offer Him food.
